name: Prudential Capital Partners
overview:
Prudential Capital Partnersâ€™ investment philosophy is focused on middle-market companies in traditional industries primarily in North America.

Prudential Capital Group, the fund sponsor, has built a strong and proprietary nationwide, middle-market investment capability through its Regional Office Network with offices in Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Frankfurt, Los Angeles, London, Newark, New York, Paris and San Francisco. Prudential Capital Group manages nearly $46 billion private capital portfolio (as of 9/30/09) of investment grade and below investment grade private debt, mezzanine and private equity.

funds.name: Prudential Capital Partners III
funds.source_description: Prudential Capital Partners Closes $965M Mezzanine Fund
